General.Name: Enapter AG
General.Description: Enapter AG designs, manufactures, and sells hydrogen generators. The company offers patented anion exchange membrane electrolysers; and energy management systems. Its electrolysers are used in power-to-heat and power-to-gas solutions, electricity storage industry, mobility, and research sectors. The company was formerly known as S&O Beteiligungen AG and changed its name to Enapter AG in November 2020. Enapter AG was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Enapter AG is a subsidiary of BluGreen Company Limited.
